head.title: Nordonia Hills City School District News Article

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; background: #FFFFFF;

span.style: font-size: calc(16em / 15);font-weight:300;color:White;font-family: synthese;
color:White;font-size: calc(16em / 15);

div.h3: Inspiring Every Student to Value Learning, Community and Excellence

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your continued support and flexibility as we work through these unprecedented times. As expected, Monday Governor DeWine announced that

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Ohio schools will be closed through May 1

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: to help prevent the community spread of COVID-19.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: For the past three weeks I have been updating you about coronavirus and the extended school closure. Today, let me tell you about our plans for our facilities as we move into spring.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Safety, security and student comfort items top the list of priorities for the Nordonia Hills City School District as the business department plans spring and summer projects. Projects will be paid for from the revenue the district is just now starting to collect after voters overwhelmingly approved an operating levy in May, 2019. The total estimated cost at this time nears $1.5 million.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Pot-hole covered parking lots and leaking roofs will be addressed at all buildings, as well as updating panels to comply with new fire code. HVAC units at each building will be replaced or serviced, and damaged old student furniture will be replaced with flexible furniture that provides more cooperative and innovative approaches to instruction. Additional safety measures include adding security cameras to each building, as well as updating alert systems that notify office staff when exterior doors are open. Some buildings will see fresh coats of paint, and others will see non-working restroom facilities repaired.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The tentative list of planned projects follows. Of course, any unplanned emergency repairs could disrupt some of the items on the list.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Nordonia High School

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Asphalt: sealing and coating of various areas. Create a safer practice area for the marching band. Approximate cost: $10,000

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Door alert system: update the alert system that notifies us when exterior doors are opened. Approximate cost: $10,000.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Fire panel: recent changes in fire codes require us to upgrade our electrical and fire panel systems to ensure they are in proper working condition in the event of a drill or emergency. These include updates/replacements to add CO2 detectors, strobes, speakers, etc. Approximate cost: $80,000

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Student furniture: replace old and damaged student furniture with flexible furniture that provides more cooperative and innovative approaches to instruction. Approximate cost: $50,000

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: HVAC: replace 2 rooftop units. Approximate cost: $50,000

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Phase 2 of roof restoration project: year 2 of restoring the high school roof will provide complete tear-offs and renovations to the intersection of the 100 & 500 hallways, and the 600 hallway. Approximate cost: $600,000

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Restrooms: renovate non-functional student restrooms. Approximate cost: $25,000

p.span: Security cameras: add and update security cameras and software. Approximate cost: $5,000

p.span: As always, thanks for your continued support of the Nordonia Schools, and Go Knights!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.br:
9370 Olde Eight Rd. Northfield, OH 44067
Phone: 330.467.0580 | Fax: 330.468.0152

div.h3: Inspiring Every Student to Value Learning, Community and Excellence
